setSwitchModeStatus

public boolean setSwitchModeStatus(int value)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   CoronisException
Set the SWITCH_MODE_STATUS parameter

Default value = 1 (automatic selection activated)

Parameters:
value -
  • 0: automatic selection deactivated
  • 1: automatic selection activated
Returns:
true if no error durring setup
Throws:
java.io.IOException
CoronisException

public boolean setRadioUserTimeOut(int value)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   CoronisException
Set the RADIO_USER_TIMEOUT parameter

Default value = 0x14 (2 seconds)

Parameters:
value - Value in multiples of 100ms
Returns:
true if no error durring setup

Default value = 1 (with acknowledgement)

  • 1: with acknowledgement

setWakeUpLength

public boolean setWakeUpLength(int[] value)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               CoronisException
Set the WAKEUP_LENGTH parameter

Default value = 1100 ms

Parameters:
value - value in multiples of 1ms, LSB first
  • min. value = 20 ms (0x1400)
  • max. value = 10 sec (0x1027)
    Returns:
    true if no error durring setup
    Throws:
    java.io.IOException
    CoronisException

setWakeUpType

                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             CoronisException
Set WAKEUP_TYPE parameter

Default value = 0: long wake-up

Parameters:
value -
  • 0: long wake-up
  • 1: short wake-up (50 ms)
Returns:
true if no error durring setup

java.io.IOException

setAwakeningPeriod

public boolean setAwakeningPeriod(int value)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  CoronisException
Set AWAKENING_PERIOD parameter

Default value = 0x0A (1 sec)

Parameters:
value - Period in multiples of 100 ms
0 for nearly constant reception (20 ms)
Returns:
true if no error durring setup
Throws:
java.io.IOException
CoronisException

setExchangeStatus

public boolean setExchangeStatus(int value)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 CoronisException
Set EXCHANGE_STATUS parameter

Default value = 0x00 (status and error frames desactivated)

Parameters:
value -
  • 0: status and error frames desactivated
  • 1: error frame activated
  • 2: status frame activated
  • 3 both status and error frames activated
Returns:
true if no error durring setup
Throws:
java.io.IOException
CoronisException

setRelayRoute

public boolean setRelayRoute(WaveTalk[] wtk)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             CoronisException
Set the RELAY_ROUTE parameter

3 repeaters maximum

Parameters:
wtk - An array with the all the repeaters
Returns:
true if no error durring setup
